query:
UPDATE v2_queue
                                SET flow_status = JSONB_SET(flow_status, ARRAY['modules', $1::TEXT, 'iterator', 'index'], ((flow_status->'modules'->$1::int->'iterator'->>'index')::int + 1)::text::jsonb),
                                last_ping = NULL
                                WHERE id = $2
                                RETURNING (flow_status->'modules'->$1::int->'iterator'->>'index')::int
